title: How to Reserve a Spot for an Event
content:
If a user asks how to reserve an event:

- Guide them to the CultPass app
- Instruct them to browse the experience catalog and tap 'Reserve'
- If it's a premium or limited event, check if reservation confirmation is required via email
- Remind them to arrive at least 15 minutes early with their QR code visible

**Suggested phrasing:**
"You can reserve an experience by opening the CultPass app, selecting your desired event, and tapping 'Reserve'. Be sure to arrive 15 minutes early with your QR code ready."

title: What's Included in a CultPass Subscription
content:
Each user is entitled to 4 cultural experiences per month, which may include:
- Art exhibitions
- Museum entries
- Music concerts
- Film screenings and more

Some premium experiences may require an additional fee (visible in the app).

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Your CultPass subscription includes 4 curated experiences each month. You can choose from museums, concerts, film events and more. Premium events may have an extra cost, which is shown during reservation."

title: How to Cancel or Pause a Subscription
content:
Users can manage their subscription via the app > 'My Account' > 'Manage Plan'.

- Cancel: Effective at the end of the billing cycle
- Pause: Preserves user data, resumes automatically when reactivated
- Do NOT offer refunds unless approved by support lead

**Suggested phrasing:**
"You can cancel or pause your subscription at any time via the 'My Account' section in the CultPass app. Cancelation takes effect at the end of your billing cycle."

title: How to Handle Login Issues?
content:
Most login issues are resolved with password reset:

- Ask the user to tap 'Forgot Password' on the login screen
- Ensure they are using the correct registered email
- If they did not receive the reset email, check spam folder or retry after 10 minutes
- For persistent login issues, escalate to human support

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Try tapping 'Forgot Password' on the login screen. Make sure you're using the email associated with your account. If the email doesn't arrive, check spam or try again in a few minutes."

title: How to Create a CultPass Account
content:
To create a new CultPass account:

- Download the CultPass app from the App Store or Google Play
- Tap 'Sign Up' and enter your full name, email, and a secure password
- Verify your email by clicking the confirmation link sent to your inbox
- Once verified, you can choose a subscription plan and start exploring experiences

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Download the CultPass app from your app store, tap 'Sign Up', and follow the registration steps. Don't forget to verify your email to activate your account."

title: How to Reset Your Password
content:
If a user has forgotten their password:

- Go to the login screen and tap 'Forgot Password'
- Enter the email address associated with the account
- A password reset link will be sent within 5 minutes
- The link expires after 24 hours
- If the email doesn't arrive, check the spam/junk folder or request a new link

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Tap 'Forgot Password' on the login screen and enter your registered email. You'll receive a reset link within a few minutes. Check spam if you don't see it."

title: How to Update Your Profile Information
content:
Users can update their profile details in the CultPass app:

- Open the app and go to 'My Account' > 'Edit Profile'
- You can change your name, phone number, and notification preferences
- Email changes require verification of the new email address
- Profile photo can be updated from the same screen

**Suggested phrasing:**
"You can update your profile by going to 'My Account' > 'Edit Profile' in the CultPass app. Note that changing your email will require re-verification."

title: What to Do If Your Account Is Blocked
content:
If a user's account is blocked:

- This may be due to payment issues, policy violations, or suspicious activity
- Ask the user to check their registered email for a notification about the block reason
- For payment-related blocks, they should update their payment method in 'My Account' > 'Billing'
- For other blocks, escalate to the support lead for manual review
- Do NOT unblock accounts directly; this requires supervisor approval

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Your account may be blocked due to a payment issue or policy review. Please check your email for details. If you need further help, I'll escalate this to our support team."

title: CultPass Subscription Tiers Explained
content:
CultPass offers two subscription tiers:

**Basic Plan:**
- 4 cultural experiences per month
- Access to standard events only
- Monthly billing at R$49.90

**Premium Plan:**
- 8 cultural experiences per month
- Access to both standard and premium events
- Priority booking for limited events
- Monthly billing at R$89.90

Both tiers include the CultPass QR code for event check-in.

**Suggested phrasing:**
"CultPass Basic includes 4 experiences/month for R$49.90. Premium gives you 8 experiences/month plus access to premium events for R$89.90."
tags: subscription, tiers, pricing, basic, premium, plans

title: How to Upgrade or Downgrade Your Subscription
content:
Users can change their subscription tier at any time:

- Go to 'My Account' > 'Manage Plan' > 'Change Tier'
- Upgrades take effect immediately with prorated billing
- Downgrades take effect at the start of the next billing cycle
- Unused quota from the current month does not carry over

**Suggested phrasing:**
"You can change your plan in the 'Manage Plan' section. Upgrades are instant, while downgrades apply from your next billing cycle."
tags: subscription, upgrade, downgrade, billing, tier change

title: Understanding Your Monthly Quota
content:
Each subscription tier has a monthly quota for cultural experiences:

- Basic: 4 experiences per month
- Premium: 8 experiences per month
- Quota resets on the 1st of each month
- Unused experiences do NOT roll over to the next month
- You can check your remaining quota in the app under 'My Account' > 'Usage'

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Your quota resets on the 1st of each month. Check your remaining experiences under 'My Account' > 'Usage' in the app."

title: How to Book Premium Experiences
content:
Premium experiences are exclusive events available to Premium subscribers:

- Look for the 'Premium' badge on experience listings
- Premium experiences may have limited slots and fill up quickly
- Premium subscribers get priority booking 48 hours before general availability
- Some premium events may require an additional fee shown during reservation
- Basic subscribers cannot book premium experiences; consider upgrading

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Premium experiences are marked with a special badge in the app. As a Premium subscriber, you get 48-hour priority booking. Some may have an additional fee."

title: Experience Availability and Scheduling
content:
CultPass experiences are scheduled throughout the month:

- New experiences are published every Monday at 9 AM
- Each experience has a specific date, time, and location
- Availability is shown in real-time in the app
- Once all slots are filled, the experience shows as 'Sold Out'
- Waitlist functionality is available for sold-out popular events

**Suggested phrasing:**
"New experiences are added every Monday. Check the app for real-time availability. If an event is sold out, you can join the waitlist."
tags: availability, scheduling, events, waitlist, sold out

title: Group Bookings and Companion Passes
content:
CultPass supports group attendance:

- Each subscriber can bring one guest per experience at no extra cost (companion pass)
- Additional guests require separate CultPass subscriptions
- Group bookings of 5+ should be made through customer support
- Companion passes must be reserved at the same time as the main booking

**Suggested phrasing:**
"You can bring one guest for free using your companion pass. Just select 'Add Companion' when making your reservation. For groups of 5+, contact our support team."

title: CultPass Payment Methods and Billing
content:
CultPass accepts the following payment methods:

- Credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, Elo)
- Debit cards
- PIX (instant payment)
- Boleto bancario (bank slip)

Billing occurs on the same date each month (based on subscription start date). Failed payments are retried 3 times over 5 days. After 3 failed attempts, the subscription is suspended.

**Suggested phrasing:**
"We accept credit/debit cards, PIX, and boleto. Your billing date is based on when you started your subscription. If a payment fails, we'll retry it over the next 5 days."
tags: payment, billing, credit card, PIX, boleto, methods

title: CultPass Refund Policy
content:
Refund guidelines for CultPass support agents:

- Reservation cancellations made 24+ hours before the event: full refund to original payment method
- Cancellations within 24 hours: no refund, but credit applied to account
- Subscription cancellation: no refund for the current billing period
- Event cancellations by CultPass: automatic full refund within 5 business days
- Refunds for premium event fees follow the same 24-hour policy
- All refund requests must be documented in the ticket

**Suggested phrasing:**
"If you cancel more than 24 hours before the event, you'll receive a full refund. For cancellations within 24 hours, we can offer account credit instead."

title: App Troubleshooting Guide
content:
Common app issues and solutions:

**App crashes or freezes:**
- Force close the app and reopen it
- Ensure the app is updated to the latest version
- Clear app cache: Settings > Apps > CultPass > Clear Cache

**QR code not displaying:**
- Check internet connection
- Pull down to refresh the reservation screen
- Log out and log back in

**Slow performance:**
- Check device storage (need at least 500MB free)
- Restart the device
- Reinstall the app if issues persist

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Try force-closing and reopening the app. If the issue persists, clear the cache or reinstall. Make sure you're running the latest version."
tags: app, troubleshooting, technical, crash, QR code, performance

title: Escalation and Contact Information
content:
When to escalate a support ticket:

- Account blocks requiring manual review
- Refund requests exceeding R$200
- Persistent technical issues not resolved by standard troubleshooting
- Reports of safety concerns at events
- Complaints about event quality or partner venues

Escalation process:
1. Update ticket status to 'escalated'
2. Add detailed notes about the issue and steps already taken
3. Tag the ticket with 'needs-human-review'

Contact channels for users:
- In-app chat: Available 24/7
- Email: support@cultpass.com.br
- Phone: 0800-CULTPASS (Mon-Fri, 9AM-6PM)

**Suggested phrasing:**
"I'm going to escalate this to our specialized support team. They'll review your case and get back to you within 24 hours."
tags: escalation, contact, support, human review, channels
